text: Prepare {{basic_roll_dough}} and let it rise. Turn out onto a floured surface, divide into thirds, and pat each third into a greased 8 1/2-inch round pan.
Make the streusel: mix {{flour}}, {{brown_sugar}}, {{granulated_sugar}}, and {{cinnamon}}. Cut in {{streusel_fat}} until crumbly, then add {{nuts}}.
Sprinkle 1/3 of the streusel topping over each coffee cake. Cover and let rise until double (30 to 45 minutes).
Bake at 375Â°F for about 20 minutes, or until done.
Immediately drizzle {{vanilla}} over each coffee cake. Serve warm. Makes 3 cakes.
